overview: Ovi is suffering from clinical depression. To overcome it, he visits Morshedpur and enters a house being their paying guest. Few days later, he receives a call in the landline of that house and get introduced to Sarah. Thus their story starts. All of a sudden something happens and Ovi realises that no matter how much they tries it's kind of impossible for them to meet. What is the reason?
title: Mayashalik
